descriptionHtml:
Whenever I download a player home, I end up taking 20 minutes adding all the trophy items by console. I made this bat file for my own convenience and decided to upload it for other's uses.

I made these for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4138425?tab=user+files]skyrimlazz's [/url]﻿[b]amazing[/b] player homes (especially Dragonfall Castle) but it's not like it won't work for other homes with trophy rooms.

This file includes all dragon priest masks, daedric artifacts, dragon claws, dawnguard paragons, black books, bugs in a jar, elder scrolls, amulets, other special books, notable weapons (auriel's bow, wuuthrad, etc) and other miscellaneous (like the skull key, draw knife,  olava's token, etc). 

To access, just hit your ~ key in game and type "bat decor" without the quotes.

To install, drop in your skyrim directory (steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim for steam users). Don't drop it in your Data folder, that's a step too far. 
I've never used NMM to install bat files, so idk how it deals with it, so use mod managers at your own risk I guess!

Feel free to comment other trophy items that I could add. Enjoy!
author: lukkamy
